message: Let's start fair, I take most now, but you'll get a better deal if we keep playing.
I'll take half, let's see if you can do better
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40, I'll take the bigger share, but you'll get more than the last offer.
You're taking a bigger share, but I'm still holding out for more
Let's be reasonable. I'll take a smaller share this time, but we need to reach an agreement soon.
I'm willing to take less, but I think I deserve more
This is my final offer. We're both losing money with every round, let's end this now.
